body_html: Thank you. However, then the condition changes. I'd either need to compare the size to 1 instead which makes the code confusing, or add a second tf.control_dependencies() around everything to ensure that dummy was gets executed before. In any way, it would be quite helpful to have an existing .peek() on queues.

body: Thank you. However, then the condition changes. I'd either need to compare the size to 1 instead which makes the code confusing, or add a second `tf.control_dependencies()` around everything to ensure that `dummy` was gets executed before. In any way, it would be quite helpful to have an existing `.peek()` on queues.
